name: Handdogg Demo
description:
-DEMO- What happens when a dog bites the hand that feeds him? 
Handdogg. A grapple-hook platformer  centered around smooth, slick movement
and a cute aesthetic.

The demo contains two levels, as well as a timer and grab-counter, so try to beat your highscore with multiple playthroughs!

My personal best scores:

Time: 78.65

Grabs: 24

Community Record:

@DevShynif

Time: 119.53

Send a screenshot of your scores to @JMRSNH and I'll the put the best ones on this page :)

If you enjoy the game or would like to see more, please consider donating a couple bucks. It goes a long way and would help me out a ton!

FYI: The game doesn't have audio yet, please understand and I'll try to update it with sound soon :)

Enjoy!
